comments.body: The daily achievements are in a (known) fixed rotation: http://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/Daily

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: While i was waiting for gw to update i had the idea that Arena net could made an apply that displays current daily achievements. It would be a great way for players to plan their game ahead. Maybe monthly too. I know that there is no connection to our accounts so we had to take notes on progression ourselves but it would be nice to know what is to do for today.
